404.title: Page not found
404.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
404.articleDescription: We couldn't find the article you're looking for. It may have been moved or deleted.
404.browseLatestArticles: Try browsing our latest articles or use the search feature to find what you need.

general.title: Something went wrong!
general.description: An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified.

article.title: Unable to Load Article
article.description: We encountered an error while loading this article. Please try again or return to the homepage.
article.defaultMessage: An unexpected error occurred while loading the article.

errors.REQUEST_TIMEOUT: The request took too long to complete. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.NETWORK_ERROR: Unable to connect to our servers. Please check your internet connection.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Our servers are experiencing issues. Please try again later.
errors.ARTICLE_VALIDATION: The article data is invalid. Please contact support if this issue persists.

NETWORK_ERROR: Try disabling VPN if you're using one
Wait a moment and try refreshing the page
REQUEST_TIMEOUT: The server is taking longer than usual
Try again in a few moments
Check if you're on a slow connection
SERVER_ERROR: This is temporary - please try again later
ARTICLE_NOT_FOUND: This article may have been moved or deleted
Check the URL for any typos
Browse our homepage for similar content
ARTICLE_VALIDATION: We received invalid data from our servers
This is likely a temporary issue
Please report this to support if it continues
DEFAULT: Contact support if the issue persists
